# Function: decode

[index](../modules/index.md).decode

â–¸ **decode**(`token`): [`Promise`]( https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise )<[`JWTDecodeResult`](../interfaces/types.JWTDecodeResult.md)\>

Decode the JWT without validation.

**`Example`**

Usage with a public JWK encoded RSA key

```js
const jwt =
  'eyJ0eXAiOiJlbnRpdHktc3RhdGVtZW50K2p3dCIsImtpZCI6IkVDIzEiLCJhbGciOiJFUzI1NiJ9..6wA0M6rNYNSFN_EylzMA6ElAibW7FVSZyoLNEkHU5c_RKuiNenT08YIMvbysYautLZotUedEMP5xCyNpY34x6Q'

const { payload, protectedHeader } = await decode(jwt)

```

#### Parameters

| Name | Type |
| :------ | :------ |
| `token` | `string` |

#### Returns

[`Promise`]( https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise )<[`JWTDecodeResult`](../interfaces/types.JWTDecodeResult.md)\>
